title: As an elder, what is the best wisdom you can pass down? - Quora

response.answer_text: Life is short. Ask a 100 year old. Let the ego go. Be the 1st to make up. Again, life is short. Be kind to everyone. Especially your parents siblings spouse and kids. Champion a cause for others. Volunteer. Take good care of your health. Especially mental.health. Pray. Take time to smell the coffee. Be patient. Trust your family and treat them well. Be extra kind to your spouse. Follow circadian rhythms. Make and eat healthy meals. Stop and talk to the needy often. Humanize them back. Everyone is going through a private battle. Be kind. Its alright if you didnt make it to all your goals and dreams. The right time is now. To do anything good. You cannot change anyone. Be the change. Keep learning new things. Grow things. Share with family and neighbors.
